    SteeringOperationStrongestPlayerArea.java --- SteeringOperation which targets the area with the highest Player strength on the map based on the tracker's information.

    • Method Detail

      • applySteeringForce

        public void applySteeringForce(Vector targetVector,
                               java.lang.Double intensity)
        Description copied from interface: SteeringOperation
        Function for applying the steering force to a given Vector.
        Parameters:
        targetVector - the Vector to which the steering force will be applied.
        intensity - the intensity with which the steering force will be applied. Greater values will have a higher impact on the Vector overall.
